label: Folder 17: Whitelaw Letter 14
description: Letter to David H. Stevens from Robert N.S. Whitelaw (June 21, 1941) requesting published material he may know of as a result of similar city planning grants the Rockefeller Foundation has given.

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value: June 21, 1941  Mr. David H. Stevens  The Rockefeller Foundation  19 West 49th Street  New York, N. Y.  Dear Mr. Stevens:  I know that you are terriby busy and I wonder if there someon in your organization that you can refer this letter to.   We have spend six months of a year"s grant from the Carnegie Corporation, made to the Carolina Art Assocation for a Charleston regional planning Committee and believe that you have made grants simiar to this from time to time. If there is any pubished materia resuting from these grants they would be hepfu to us and I would appreciate any information you can give me as to their sources.  Sincerely yours,  Robert N. S. Whitelaw,   Director  rnsw;em
